website_summaries.verdict: Although pricey, this exceptional model is worth every penny considering the treasures you are likely to find. A close contender to our top pick.
pros: Well-made yet lightweight and easy to maneuver
Has 9 built-in programs and 35 frequencies to assist you in your searches
Includes a wireless remote and headphones
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the range
Complicated to learn all of its capabilities and functions, especially for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Advanced tech, super light
customer_reviews.text: This is the one to get. It is really great for discriminating between junk and treasure. It gives you a ton of useful information before you decide to dig. On my first day out I was digging about half coins and half trash, which is a good ratio, and I found a cool ring. It is super light, usb rechargeable, and very compact. Setup takes seconds. It also has a ton of advanced features for experts, but the simple defaults work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amnon Liu

customer_reviews.title: The best by far.
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing this for a long time, and own or have owned the top of the line brand names that everyone wants. This thing is just plain awesome. Very quick to learn and loads of no nonsense videos online. Lightweight, yup no more Popeye arm!
customer_reviews.author: Frank D K

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice addition and is a great machine to work with alongside the CTX3030. It's a whole different animal and will keep you on your toes. First day I used it I went to an old park I had hit a hundred times...as does everyone else. Pulled a Barber dime from 9 inches down.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: The pictrue says it all...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you XP deus.... the picture says a million words
customer_reviews.author: Travis.k

customer_reviews.title: Modern simple but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, modern but I wish I hadn't got the larger headphones, they're just way to hot to wear in temperatures above 80 degrees F.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but has a steep learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Good detector but has a steep learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Constance M. Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: ... a few days now and have made a few great finds. Would definitely recommend this detector
customer_reviews.text: Had the XP Deus for a few days now and have made a few great finds. Would definitely recommend this detector. just
customer_reviews.author: Gary Price

customer_reviews.title: received a 1600 dollar machine opened and cuff off headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: received a 1600 dollar machine opened and cuff off headphones box was pre opened and messed with. still works but unhappy....you have to send it to France to get it worked on.... works,but something this expensive should nevver arrived possibly "used"
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rappaport

customer_reviews.title: It's programmable and you can enter your favorite tweaked programs and save them for use down the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought from an individual. Detects deeper than you may want to dig. Has a learning curve, but several out of the box programs you can use immediately. Have had going on 2 years, no battery problems, always works flawlessly. I would give it 10 stars if I could. I consider it the bomb.4 different frequencies to pick from and use (only one at a time). It's programmable and you can enter your favorite tweaked programs and save them for use down the road. Very sturdy and a little rain or mud won't hurt the components.At least hasn't hurt mine.2 pounds and wireless, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Fonebone

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, fast/responsive and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I own a Whites V3i, Whites Surfmaster PI Dual Field, Minelab CTX-3030, XP Deus, and a Garrett Ace 250. The XP Deus is the detector I continually go back to again and again! It's extremely light weight, very responsive and easy to use. The Basic program will get you up and running with very little fuss. Then delve a bit deeper into Deus Fast and the other modes for more detailed detecting. This is a great detector for cherry picking since it's so fast. Absolutely love it, and the updates keep coming! V5 was just released along with a bunch of new coils and a new MI-4 pinpointer!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A. Epler

customer_reviews.title: Beast detector right here...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this detector and i think i am in love! This thing goes deep! Also, it's very fast. It can differentiate a coin from a nail when the two are just inches apart. The first thing I noticed when I unboxed it is how sturdy and well-built it is. And the controls are configurable a million different ways. Now I see why everyone's been raving about this thing. Try it. You'll fall in love.
customer_reviews.author: laidback4sho

product_meta.title: XP DEUS Metal Detector + Wireless WS5 Full Headphones + Controller and 11 inch Coil
product_meta.description:
Specifications Headset 

 * Wireless headphone with controls and LCD screen
 * One click headband replacement
 * Can control the detector alone
 * Lithium battery and charger included
 * ABS transport case included

LCD Remote  * Can control and adjust the detector alone
 * Built in speaker works with or without headphones
 * 1/8" audio headphone jack
 * Four non-motion modes
 * Precise audio and visual discrimination
 * Extended iron discrimination
 * Nine preset factory programs
 * Expert menu
 * Belt clip included
 * Full graphic display
 * Low power consumption backlight
 * Intuitive screen functions
 * Battery life: +/- 27 hours

Search Coil  * 11" X35 Round standard search coil
 * Carbon fiber infused DD
 * Light weight
 * Waterproof
 * Includes coil cover
 * Includes hardware
 * Contains metal detector electronics
 * Battery Life: +/- 20 hours (depending on power and frequency)
 * Total of 35 frequencies – 5 main frequencies with 7 wide offsets 3.7 to 4.4kHz, 7.1 to 8.4kHz, 10.5 to 12.4kHz, 15.2 to 17.8kHz, 23.5 to 27.7kHz
 * Selectable frequency offset without loss of performance
 * TX power adjustment is available on all frequencies and offsets
 * Special Low frequency TX Boost feature:
 * Normal or Boost option – The transmitted power has 2 selectable levels when using frequencies 3.7Khz to 4.4kHz.
 * The BOOST mode significantly increases the transmission power of the transmitting coil, allowing greater detection levels if the soil conditions allow.
 * TX boost is a special mode, the battery life of the coil may be reduced down to 6 hours.
 *
feature_bullets: XP Deus Metal Detector with 11″ X35 DD Waterproof Wireless Search Coil, Coil Cover, WS5 Wireless Full Sized Headphones, Wireless Remote Control Display Screen, Hip mount case for Remote Control, and a 5 Year Parts and Labor Warranty.
The XP Deus features Audio Response, Iron level, Multi tone, Notch, Discrimination, Ground balance, Motion & 4 non-motion modes, Extended discrimination range, and 9 Pre-configured factory programs.
This detector is lightweight and compact, offering exceptional comfort, speed and performance.
Total of 35 frequencies – 5 main frequencies with 7 wide offsets 3.7 to 4.4kHz, 7.1 to 8.4kHz, 10.5 to 12.4kHz, 15.2 to 17.8kHz, 23.5 to 27.7kHz
High frequencies 23- 27.7kHz – Excellent sensitivity to low conductive targets and small targets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars14 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
